title: Fantasy football talk
author: VD
content_html:
“If it wasn’t for porn, fantasy football would be the best thing about the Internet.”
– Matt Berry, ESPN

Now is the time to put your name in the hat if you want to play this year. Nate, the WB, myself and last year’s winner, the East Mesa White Trash, will be back so we’ll need six new participants. Remember, you’ll inherit the two keepers from last season, so there is a degree of difficulty here.

If you’re interested, put your name in the hat here.
content_text:
“If it wasn’t for porn, fantasy football would be the best thing about the Internet.”
– Matt Berry, ESPN
Now is the time to put your name in the hat if you want to play this year.  Nate, the WB, myself and last year’s winner, the East Mesa White Trash, will be back so we’ll need six new participants.  Remember, you’ll inherit the two keepers from last season, so there is a degree of difficulty here.
If you’re interested, put your name in the hat here.
